Key Match Events: Mahmoud Alaswad scored the opening goal for Syria
Syria scored two goals on the counter-attack
India finished the match with 18 shots
Post-Match Reflections: Coach Manolo Marquez was angry with the first half performance
Marquez was pleased with the second half performance
Marquez believes India deserved at least a goal
Miscellaneous Highlights: India are yet to register a win in this calendar year
Others: India will play matches against Vietnam and Lebanon next month
